LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailSimple.label: make simple cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailSimple.description: Make a simple cocktail quickly mixed from a duo of ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailFine.label: make fine cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailFine.description: Make a fine cocktail, mixed precisely from multiple ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailLavish.label: make lavish cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailLavish.description: Make a lavish cocktail, mixed from a wide variety of ingredients and chilled to perfection before meticulously shaken and served.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCoffee.label: make coffee
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCoffee.description: Make a warm, bitter beverage usually complemented with milk and sugar. A favorite among students and office workers across the galaxy due to high caffeine content and pleasing aroma.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeEnergyDrink.label: make energy drink
LanguageData.VBE_MakeEnergyDrink.description: Make a sour and fizzy drink finished off with a hint of bitterness. The combination of sugar and caffeine means a burst of energy upfront, but with a crash later. Notable aftertaste of radiation.
LanguageData.VBE_MixJuice.label: mix fruit juice
LanguageData.VBE_MixJuice.description: Mix a simple fruit juice made from a few fruits.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeSodaSyrup.label: make soda syrup
LanguageData.VBE_MakeSodaSyrup.description: Make soda syrup by mixing natural fruit juice with high fructose corn syrup.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrosiaMush.label: make ambrosia mush
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrosiaMush.description: Make sliced and pressed ambrosia, can be left alone to ripen into must to be further distilled into an extremely fine liquor.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTequilaMust.label: make tequila must
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTequilaMust.description: Make a thin mixture of juiced agave sap or prickly cactus pear and insect meat starter, ready to be cut and fermented in a barrel.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWhiskeyMash.label: make whiskey mash
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWhiskeyMash.description: Make a starchy and mostly liquid mixture with pulpy chunks strewn throughout. Ready To be aged.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeVodkaMash.label: make vodka mash
LanguageData.VBE_MakeVodkaMash.description: Make a thick, starchy mash of raw potatoes and a starter, ready to be fermented.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGinMush.label: make gin mush
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGinMush.description: Make a clear but cloudy mixture of juiced berries and miscellaneous grain, ready to be fermented.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigarettes.label: make cigarettes
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigarettes.description: Make a small, rolled paper tube stuffed loosely with tobacco leaves.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigars.label: make cigars
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigars.description: Make a fat, dried tobacco leaf stuffed to the brim with more tobacco leaves and a gold foil wrap around it.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTea.label: make tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTea.description: Make a pleasing, aromatic beverage prepared by steeping a bag of tea leaves in boiling water.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeLuciferiumPowder.label: make luciferium powder
LanguageData.VBE_MakeLuciferiumPowder.description: Make a very finely blended powder made from luciferium. Usually put around rims of alcoholic drinks in bars frequented by the wealthy and powerful.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGoJuiceStock.label: make go-juice stock
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGoJuiceStock.description: Make a gelatinized cube of Go-Juice, able to be digested rather than injected. While it can be used in any meal, it is often melted into soups or used as a thickening agent in cocktails.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWakeUpPowder.label: make wake-up powder
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWakeUpPowder.description: Make a crushed and powdered form of wake-up, surprisingly sweet and sometimes used as a replacement for sugar in desserts or dissolved into a morning espresso.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeSodaSyrupBulk.label: make soda syrup (efficient)
LanguageData.VBE_MakeSodaSyrupBulk.description: Make soda syrup by mixing natural fruit juice with sugar. This recipe is much more efficient.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWhiskeyMashFromFlour.label: make whiskey mash from flour
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWhiskeyMashFromFlour.description: Make a starchy and mostly liquid mixture with pulpy chunks strewn throughout. Ready To be aged.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailGourmet.label: make gourmet cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailGourmet.description: Make a gourmet cocktail, where every factor from temperature of glass, choice of stirring instrument and type of garnish has been precisely calculated for the maximum flavor and body possible.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeUnfermentedCider.label: make unfermented cider
LanguageData.VBE_MakeUnfermentedCider.description: Make unfermented cider with a starter in an air-tight bottle. If left alone to develop the proper bacteria the end result will be a weak alcoholic beverage.
